search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Knowify (knowify.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Knowify is located at: https://www.knowify.com/pricing【3:0†source】.

Compare plans and features
--------------------------

### Core features

Onboarding sessions

The number of included one-on-one onboarding sessions. Need more? Just ask.

2

4

Unlimited

Award-winning support

Award-winning 100% U.S.-based support. Real people, ready to help you quickly via screenshare, phone call, email, or chat.

Standard

Standard

Priority

CRM

Keep your most important data organized and ready to use on jobs - customers, vendors, products, and employees all sync between Knowify and QuickBooks.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Mobile app

Empower you team in the field with the iOS or Android mobile app. Check schedules and assigned tasks, clock-in and out for the day, upload photos, record expenses, and much more.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Unlimited jobs

Take on as much work as you can handle - there's no limits and no additional fees for service jobs or projects in Knowify.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Custom branded documents

Our team will work with you to get your proposals, change orders, and invoices looking exactly how you want them to, at no additional cost.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Unlimited users included

No

No

Yes

### Estimates, proposals, & contracts

Estimates & Proposals

Quickly build estimates for any pricing model, and send professional-looking proposals & legally binding contracts in minutes

Yes

Yes

Yes

Fixed-price contracts

Lump sum contracts billed on a % of completion or unit basis

Yes

Yes

Yes

Cost plus/T&M contracts

Contracts for time & materials jobs or jobs requiring custom pricing tools.

No

Yes

Yes

Subcontracts

Create subcontracts directly from your project plan, and email them to your subs.

No

Yes

Yes

Calculated cost templates

Make estimating for new jobs easier with cost templates that do all the math for you. Once you’ve built your template, just enter the units (e.g., square feet, yards) and Knowify instantly calculates estimated costs for labor, materials, equipment, subcontractors, and miscellaneous expenses.

No

Yes

Yes

### Project management

Unlimited documents & photos

Unlimited storage to keep all your project and company documents organized in one simple system. Upload new documents and photos from the field or the office, and choose what your employees and clients can and can't see.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Scheduling

Drag-and-drop scheduling for your employees, subcontractors, & equipment. Quickly see availability across your projects and service work in one place, and see a real-time map view with pins representing each employee's last check-in. Employees can easily check their schedule using the Knowify mobile app.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Time tracking

Track employee and equipment time your way. Have employees clock in and out through the geofenced Knowify mobile app, let a foreman enter time for on-site staff, or input time manually from the web app. Review and approve all entries from one screen, then integrate directly with QuickBooks Payroll. However you record time, Knowify ensures your fully loaded labor costs are accurately tracked to the right project and phase.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Change orders

Protect your business and bottom line. Create and send change orders for e-signature, or log field-approved ones. Get instant notifications and see their effect on profitability. Knowify automatically applies them to the correct billing cycle, preventing over or under-billing.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Task management

Quickly assign tasks to one or more team members for each phase of a project, viewable from the web or mobile app. Set deadlines, include comments, and save your most common tasks for quick re-use.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Projects dashboard

See every project on one dashboard, where you can quickly see key information like status, projected profitability, WIP, and more. View projects as a list or in a kanban view, based on their stage in your project workflow.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Project budgets

Get the details right before you bid. Create a detailed phase-by-phase project plan, and calculate the costs, employees, equipment, and time needed for each stage of your project. Save your most used project plans and phases as templates, to be used as a starting point for future work.

No

Yes

Yes

Project planning & tracking

Build detailed phase-by-phase project plans with breakdowns for labor, materials, equipment, and subs. Schedule phases, set dependencies, assign work orders, and track progress by % or specific units—all in one place. Manage every aspect of your project against the initial plan, with costs and % of completion updating automatically as your team works.

No

Yes

Yes

Daily logs

Get daily, auto-generated summaries of jobsite activities, that include employees on-site, weather, safety incidents, project progress, photos, and more.

No

Yes

Yes

Work orders

Create work orders for any phase of a project, and share them with your team in the field via the Knowify mobile app or save them as shareable PDF docs.

No

Yes

Yes

Client portal

Provide next-level customer service with a branded portal showing project status, photos, change orders, invoice history, and more.

No

Yes

Yes

Custom workflows

Stay organized with customizable Kanban boards tailored to your business. Create multiple boards with up to ten stages each, matching your unique workflow—from initial contact to project completion—so you can easily track jobs at every stage.

No

Yes

Yes

RFIs & Submittals

Send or request RFIs and submittals in a system that automatically keeps track of status, communications, & revision history.

No

No

Yes

### Invoicing & project finances

Progress billing

Manage progress billing effortlessly with a real-time QuickBooks sync. Knowify auto-configures invoices for your selected contract type, pulling items from your estimate or contract that you can then adjust. Whether billing time & materials, fixed price, or submitting an AIA pay app, adjustments take minutes. Track invoice and pay app statuses in real-time as payments update in Knowify or QuickBooks.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Purchases, bills, & expenses

The ultimate solution for keeping project financials organized. See every purchase order, vendor bill, and employee expense in one place with all relevant details - it doesn't matter if it was logged in QuickBooks or Knowify. A real-time 2-way sync means every incurred cost is reflected against your projects immediately, and you, your team, and your accountant can work wherever you're most comfortable

Yes

Yes

Yes

Accounts receivable management

See all your invoices and pay apps in one place, with clear visibility of what's been paid, what's overdue, and when your next invoice should be sent. Click into any invoice for specific details and history, and easily email or export.

Yes

Yes

Yes

AIA Pay Applications (G702 & G703)

Streamline the creation and sending of pay apps and AIA forms G702/G703 with an automated schedules of values, retainage tracking, and change order reconciliation. All you need to enter is percentage of completion and stored materials - Knowify does the rest.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Payment processing

Accept payments by ACH or Credit Card directly from invoices sent via Knowify when you connect to your free QuickBooks Payments account. Get paid up to 4x faster, with low, competitive rates.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Job costing

Get accurate job costs without disrupting your team. Knowify tracks work and automatically assigns expenses to the correct project, phase, and cost category—materials, labor, equipment, subcontractors, or misc. Whether it’s team clock-ins, purchase orders in Knowify, or vendor bills logged in QuickBooks Online, expenses and revenue stay up-to-date and organized.

No

Yes

Yes

Real-time WIP reporting

See your real-time work-in-progress calculation on any project, so you know whether you've over or under-billed, and can take corrective action.

No

Yes

Yes

### Organization & Reporting

User permissions

Basic permissions control access to high-level transaction types like bills, invoices, and proposals.  
  
Advanced permissions offer more granular controls, such as hiding costs while showing quantities, restricting labor rates and wages, and limiting visibility to relevant jobs only.

Basic

Basic

Advanced

Reporting

Basic Reporting  
Stay informed with real-time dashboards and easily exportable reports for all your day-to-day operations.  
  
Advanced Reporting  
Take control of your data with a customizable report builder, or use pre-configured reports to analyze team, project, and financial performance in detail.

Basic

Basic

Advanced

Inventory management

Keep track of stored parts & material, whether they're in a warehouse, office, or truck. Allocate stored items to projects as they're used to stay on top of quantity-on-hand and properly track job costs. Transfer materials between locations in a few clicks, and view the full journey of any part or material over time - from the purchase order, to the warehouse, to the jobsite.

$

$

Included

Subcontractor management

Manage subcontractors and subcontracts with dedicated budgeting categories, easy creation of subcontracts, and real-time tracking of costs. Stay compliant with automatic tracking of licenses, insurance, and other documents, plus alerts for expirations. Generate detailed reports on subcontractor performance, billing, and compliance to keep projects organized and on track.

No

Yes

Yes

Equipment tracking

Keep your owned equipment organized by scheduling it to project phases and tracking availability. Assign usage costs to monitor project expenses and depreciation. Generate reports to evaluate efficiency and decide whether to rent or own.

No

No

Yes

### Service Pro

Service jobs

Book, manage, and schedule one-time, recurring, or multi-day service jobs.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Dispatching and scheduling

View every tech’s availability at a glance and quickly add unassigned jobs onto their calendar. Assign a service tech to new jobs in just a click, and instantly share the details they need to get the job done right.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Service map

See a live map of all your active service jobs for a given day, and quickly route nearby techs to urgent jobs.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Service assets

Maintain a detailed service asset database with equipment specs, photos, and service history, while giving service techs mobile access to manuals, service notes, and repair records.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Maintenance agreements

Create and send maintenance contracts, then schedule and track recurring visits automatically.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Service portal

A professional, self-service portal where your customers can view job activity, documents, and invoices and make payments.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Inventory management

Keep track of stored parts & material, whether they're in a warehouse, office, or truck. Allocate stored items to projects as they're used to stay on top of quantity-on-hand and properly track job costs. Transfer materials between locations in a few clicks, and view the full journey of any part or material over time - from the purchase order, to the warehouse, to the jobsite.

Yes

Yes

Yes

### Integrations

QuickBooks Online

The #1 QuickBooks integration in construction. Sync nearly everything both ways between Knowify and QuickBooks Online, including customers, vendors, purchases, expenses, invoices, time, and even projects for those on QuickBooks Online Plus or Advanced.

Yes

Yes

Yes

QuickBooks Time

Track time in Knowify or QuickBooks time, and see the same labor data in both platforms for easy job costing or payroll processing.

Yes

Yes

Yes

QuickBooks Online Payroll

Track and approve time in Knowify and sync directly with Timesheets in QuickBooks Online Payroll to make payday a breeze.

Yes

Yes

Yes

QuickBooks Payments

Accept payments by ACH or Credit Card directly from invoices sent via Knowify when you connect to your free QuickBooks Payments account. Get paid up to 4x faster, with low, competitive rates.

Yes

Yes

Yes

CompanyCam

Capture unlimited geo and time-stamped photos, annotate with notes, and create project timelines, galleries, and reports. Share photos directly with clients through invoices and documents in Knowify.

Yes

Yes

Yes

Zapier

Connect Knowify to thousands of apps with Zapier to automate workflows and save time. Sync data seamlessly between Knowify and your favorite tools, such as CRM systems, task managers, and communication apps, ensuring your projects and operations stay streamlined and efficient.

No

Yes

Yes

QuickBooks Desktop

QuickBooks Desktop Integration  
Seamlessly connect Knowify with QuickBooks Desktop to keep your project and financial data in sync. Transfer invoices, vendor bills, and more between platforms, at the push of a button to ensure accurate job costing and streamlined bookkeeping for every project.

No

No

Yes

Intuit Enterprise Suite

Integrate Knowify with Intuit Enterprise Suite for seamless project and financial management across multiple companies. Sync job costs, invoices, and change orders while leveraging advanced features like custom fields and multi-company reporting to streamline operations and drive smarter decisions.

No

No

Yes
